snippet: Landing near Shanghai, a typhoon forced more than a million people were forced to evacuate and the city’s two major airports delayed or canceled hundreds of flights.
abstract: Typhoon striking the eastern coast of China near Shanghai creates torrential rain and powerful winds that knock out power and force the evacuation of more than a million people.
lead_paragraph: Landing near Shanghai, a typhoon forced more than a million people were forced to evacuate and the city’s two major airports delayed or canceled hundreds of flights.
